Infectum.turoyo: Panǝk alo iḏan mǝmlǝnwa kube hŭl d-mixarǧiwa. Because of those ones, gosh, our hands were filled with thorns untill they were inured. (No 183: 2018_07_au_003_NE_1F.

Preterit.turoyo: 1)Mxaraǧno bu kewo pis. (İlyas p.c) Mxaraǧno bi dawlaṯe. I have been exhausted (fucked up) in this country. (İlyas p.c)
translations: I was exhausted by a severe illness.

Preterit.turoyo: mxarǧi aḥ ḥayayḏi bu ṭurano (meqǝm ruḥayye). (İlyas p.c.: pis yo)
translations: My life was spent (by itself, anticausative) in this mountainside.

Preterit.turoyo: Mxarǧi aḥ ḥayayḏi bi walayaṯe. My life has been spent in this city. (İlyas p.c)
